sentences.sContent: technology that will safeguard the environment
As an additional safeguard against weeds you can always use an underlay of heavy duty polyethylene.
sentences.sCn: 作为另外一种预防杂草的防护措施，你可以一直使用一层厚重耐磨的聚乙烯底垫。

remMethod.val: Safeguard (舒肤佳)， 保护健康为全家

trans.tranOther: to protect something from harm or damage

trans.tranCn: 安全装置， 安全措施
trans.tranOther: A safeguard is a law, rule, or measure intended to prevent someone or something from being harmed
